sources.title: Maze | Full Movie | Action Prison Drama | True Jailbreak Story
sources.description:
Maze - Based on the true story of the 1983 mass breakout of 38 IRA prisoners from HMP Maze high-security prison in Northern Ireland. As Larry Marley (Tom Vaughan-Lawlor, Avengers: Infinity War), the chief architect of the escape, schemes his way towards pulling off this feat, he manipulates prison warder Gordon Close (Barry Ward, Jimmy's Hall) in order to get closer to his goal. 
2017.  Stars: Tom Vaughan-Lawlor, Barry Ward, Martin McCann
*Licensed from MVD Entertainment. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: Inspired by the true events of the infamous 1983 prison breakout of 38 IRA prisoners from HMP, which was to become the biggest prison escape in Europe since World War II.
metadata.Actors: Tom Vaughan-Lawlor, Barry Ward, Martin McCann
